thread.section_title: OptiContacts.com Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of OptiContacts.com | opticontacts.com
thread.title: Tracie Antoinette W.
thread.title_full: OptiContacts.com reviewed by Tracie Antoinette W.

author: Tracie Antoinette W.
title: Tracie Antoinette W.
text: It took a total of 9 days to get my lenses via USPS-First Class. I never received the tracking number by email, so I had to get it from their site. While my customer service agent was helpful and friendly, I'm not impressed with their Order Status Screen.
